New docs:

Title: Overview: Forensic Watermarking
Description: Brightcove has partnered with NAGRA to provide forensic watermarking as a feature in the Video Cloud platform. This will help protect your premium content from piracy and unauthorized content sharing. This feature also helps to quickly identify the source of a content leak, so that action can be taken.
Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/general/overview-forensic-watermarking.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Video Cloud, Zencoder
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: FAQ: Forensic Watermarking
Description: In this topic, you can view the answers to a number of frequently asked questions related to Brightcove Forensic Watermarking.
Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/general/faq-forensic-watermarking.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Video Cloud, Zencoder
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Forensic Watermarking with Brightcove Player
Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Brightcove Player to deliver videos protected with Forensic Watermarking.
Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/forensic-watermarking-with-bcp.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Video Cloud, Brightcove Player
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Forensic Watermarking with the Native SDKs
Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use the Brightcove Native SDKs to deliver videos protected with Forensic Watermarking.
Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/forensic-watermarking-with-sdks.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Video Cloud, Brightcove SDKs
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Forensic Watermarking
Description: In this topic, you will get a high-level overview of Brightcove's Forensic Watermarking feature for Zencoder.
Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-guides/forensic-watermarking.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Zencoder
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Forensic Watermarking Settings
Description: This topic provides information on settings for forensic watermarking.
Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/content-protection/encoding-settings-forensic-watermarking.html
Category: Forensic Watermarking, Zencoder
Status: Released
Type: New Doc

Title: Publishing a Cloud Playout Channel
Description: In this topic you will learn how to make a Cloud Playout channel part of your Beacon app. (This version for Beacon LA - NOT RELEASED)
Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/publish-channel-beacon.html
Category: Beacon, Cloud Playout
Status: Internal
Type: New Doc

Major updates:

Title: Managing Playlists Using the CMS API
Description: Smart Playlists can now be created using the v2 search syntax, which allows more complex search strings
Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-playlists-using-cms-api.html#Search_field
Category: CMS API, Smart Playlists
Status: Released
Type: Major Update

Title: Getting Started with Brightcove Video Connect for the Drupal CMS
